interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LSxia 4PCS Braided Hair Clips for Braids, Four-Leaf Clover Chopped Hairpin Duckbill Clip with 3 Small Hair Clips for Styling, Sparkling Rhinestone Crystal Stone Braided Hair Clip for Women
Review Date: 2022/11/13
Store: LSxia
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LSxia', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Rhinestone', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Package Dimensions': '4.06 x 2.68 x 1.34 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LX1117-1'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:9c72ea2572a53de4ffffdc95b5e81cc1]] I like that it’s something different and it’s not that hard to do. These are fairly well made, and I like the colors and they are functional. The sparkly flowers are hot glued on, so I worry a little bit about the longevity. There are also some white strings coming out from under the flowers like hot glue stings.
Review Title: Cute
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Wavertree & London Pineapple, Coconut & Lime (1 Bar) Simple Scents Australia ['Australian Soapworks Wavertree & London 200g Soap - Pineapple, Coconut & Limeis produced in Australia by dedicated artisan soap makers using the traditional French Milling process. The soaps are wrapped in embossed paper and enriched with pure Organic Shea Butter.Tropical ingredients rejuvenate sun-damaged skin, improving overall skin texture. Lime invigorates the lungs, vitamin C encourages collagen renewal, and coconut fortifies skin and seals in moisture.'] {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Simple Scents Australia', 'Scent': 'Coconut,Pineapple,Lime', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 2.5 x 0.8 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B010C79OCA_US', 'Manufacturer': 'Simple Scents Australia'} Smells so much better than expected! I got the beach scent for Christmas and liked the quality lathering 🧼 so I was curious to try this one and it smells like just like the Sandals Resorts lotions/soaps which is very lemongrass like. Super pleased. Love the brand and the shipping was super fast. So pleased with the smell and quick delivery [Upgrade] FUGACAL Hair Straightener Brush, 30s Fast Heating, 3 Temp Settings, Anti-Scald Design and 30mins Auto-Off, Bring You Ultra Straight Hair with Natural Shiny Look in Minutes Fugacal {'Brand': 'Fugacal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Hair Type': 'Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '12.2 x 1.8 x 1.7 inches; 1.79 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'FG-HS01', 'Manufacturer': 'Fugacal'} I was very nervous to try this steaming straightener brush. The directions are very thorough so I felt confident. There are a lot of warnings about this product so make sure you read the instructions carefully. Once I did a few hair sections it felt like I had been doing it for years and all my fears were gone. I did not burn myself and my hair came out super smooth and pretty. It’s easy to do a little curl at the end if you rotate your wrist outwards which I like. I would recommend this product! Quick shipping and great packaging I am impressed! INGRINC Lying Silkworm Eyeliner Pen Shiny Matte Rotatable Highlighter Makeup Eyeshadow Pencil Brighten Bottom-Eyelid Silkworm Makeup Eyeshadow Eyeliner Pen for Women Girls (2,3,5) INGRINC ['1'] {'Color': '2,3,5', 'Brand': 'INGRINC', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1'} Instead of getting #1 I think I got #2 according to the boxes. Ironically number two was the only one that was smooth when applying and the other ones were so dry I couldn’t get any color from them! I attached a picture showing that only a few sparkles managed to stick onto my left eye area. It looks sad.
My right eye was the one I used number two on and it looks better than the other eye but still not great. I imagine if I were to have gotten the correct pen (#1) it would have been just as dry as the other two because it was a glittery one like the #3 & #5…. In my opinion this is not worth the money and I do not recommend. Only one pen was semi good Folie for Women EDP - Eau De Parfum 100ml(3.4 oz) | Saffron, Red Fruits, Hedione, Jasmine, Moss, Amber | Perfume, Perfumes for women, Women's fragrances, Fragrance, Womens perfume | by Intense Elite INTENSE ELITE {'Brand': 'INTENSE ELITE', 'Item Volume': '100 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 3.39 x 3.35 inches; 3.4 Ounces'} The box is not as bougie as the other ones from this brand presentation wise. The scent is very strong. One squirt a day type strong. The best way to describe this in my opinion is floral /woodsy. I don’t have the most educated nose though. The bottle is beautiful. Very nice but not my favorite from this brand. Smells very floral Crave Extreme For Men EDP - Eau De Parfum 100ml(3.4 oz) | Pepper, Calabrian Bergamot, Elemi, Vetiver, Pink Pepper, Sichuan Pepper, Patchouli, Lavender, Geranium, Cedar, Ambroxan & Labdanum | Perfume, Perfumes for men, Men's fragrances, Fragrance, Men's eau de parfum | by Intense Elite INTENSE ELITE {'Brand': 'INTENSE ELITE', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '100 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Cedar,Floral,Lavender', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '6.18 x 2.95 x 2.76 inches; 3.4 Ounces'} Wood scent undertones and isn’t over powering. Presentation across the board is great, packaging A+ for gifts. My husband’s fav (he’s tried 4 from this brand) LSxia 4PCS Braided Hair Clips for Braids, Four-Leaf Clover Chopped Hairpin Duckbill Clip with 3 Small Hair Clips for Styling, Sparkling Rhinestone Crystal Stone Braided Hair Clip for Women LSxia {'Brand': 'LSxia', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Rhinestone', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Package Dimensions': '4.06 x 2.68 x 1.34 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LX1117-1'} [[VIDEOID:9c72ea2572a53de4ffffdc95b5e81cc1]] I like that it’s something different and it’s not that hard to do. These are fairly well made, and I like the colors and they are functional. The sparkly flowers are hot glued on, so I worry a little bit about the longevity. There are also some white strings coming out from under the flowers like hot glue stings. Cute
profile:
The user continues to prioritize high-quality personal care products that create a beach or vacation ambiance, with a strong preference for tropical and refreshing scents such as coconut, pineapple, and lime. Their commitment to rejuvenating and moisturizing fragrances and effective lathering performance remains paramount. Recently, the user has shown an evolving appreciation for diverse fragrance profiles, including wood scent undertones, signaling a broader exploration of quality cosmetics.

In their latest purchase, the user highlighted a preference for unique styling accessories, demonstrating a willingness to try new products while maintaining a discerning eye for quality and craftsmanship. They value reliability in service, quick shipping, and excellent packaging, which they deem essential to their overall shopping experience. The user is drawn to beautiful designs and strong scents but continually emphasizes effective skincare and hair care solutions.

Their enjoyment of sensory-rich experiences and natural ingredients in wellness and beauty routines persists, with a consistent preference for artisan and organic brands. This evolving profile reflects the user's balance between exploring new styles and fragrances while upholding their foundational values of quality, functionality, and user satisfaction. Their interactions showcase a discerning and adaptive approach to beauty and personal care.
